title: Stephen Ross on Palm Beach Development, Dolphins Offers
description: Stephen Ross, CEO and Chair of Related Ross, founder of Related Companies and owner of the Miami Dolphins, discusses the outlook for business development in West Palm Beach and the future ownership of the Dolphins franchise with Bloomberg’s Caroline Salas on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
